'''Astrologist Mona Megistus''',<ref name="Astrologist" group="Note" /><ref name="OW" /> alternatively '''Mona Megistus, the Astrologist''',<ref name="quest" /> is a playable [[Hydro]] [[character]] in ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

An astrologist of knowledgeable skill and high pride, Mona has settled in [[Mondstadt]] to avoid suffering the ire of [[Mona's Master|her master]] after unwittingly reading the latter's diary.
